Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Status: OK
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
07.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
02.10.2008 SH SCR13995 Added PO.ChangesInOPH202B5, uses in OPH202B to
update BTCP variables only if something was changed in OPH202B5
28.07.2008 SH SCR13804 Added DEBC_LANGUAGE (uses to obtain LANG)
19.10.2007 SH SCR13006 In case of already existing PAYD row, this row
is no updated, instead of creating a new one
18.04.2007 SH SCR12398 Changed handling to enter standard text
09.12.2005 SH SCR9723 Added new field PAYD_COLLECT, update with 'N'
24.03.2005 SH SCR8035 Added test on "Standard text", it's now mandatory
//26-09-2003 JP SCR #4413 submitter note: add update on second describtion

from GB004 = "?"
11.09.2003 SH SCR4318 Added tests for lettertype = 'D', see SCR for details
-- 23.03.2003 RR -> SCR3195 Implementation of shortcut handling
-- 10.12.2002 SH SCR2579 Move NULL() to PAYD_DATEACK instead of 0
-- 04.07.2002 SH If program start set cursor on field "Standard text"
-- SCR#556 15.01.2002 OK (wrong variable text was shown to the actual
-- records in the view)
-- Amount from BTCP must recalculate, because changes could be made
-- before entering this screen and parameters included old values
-- See remark in SubTask --> R.P.
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- see remark in R.S.
-- Need for display
-- Get NAME from table CLIENT
-- Get DEBH for display debtor heller and display debtor client fields
-- Get NAME, CITY from table DEBH
-- Initialized some virtuals
If there already exists an PAYMENT_DIFFERENCE row for the BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOIC
some virtuals can be initialized
-- Jump to filed "Standardtext"
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- Cancel = 'C'
-- Save entries and exit
-- Don't save entries --> EXIT

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT PAYD_ID, PAYD_LETTER_TYPE, PAYD_VARIABLETEXT1, PAYD_VARIABLETEXT2 FROM :1 WHERE PAYD_BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and PAYD_BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and PAYD_BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and PAYD_BPIV_LINENO = :5

Text.val: -- Look for an existing PAYMENT_DIFFERENCE and get some
-- virtuals, see T.S.
-- Initialize field --> Paymentcode description
-- Get Paymentcode description
